description: This Dart source file defines a Flutter widget for creating a new booking, including form inputs for room ID, check-in, and check-out dates, and handles booking creation via a service. It also manages navigation to a payment screen after booking.

classes.name: BookingCreateScreen
classes.description: A StatefulWidget allowing users to create a new booking, optionally prefilled with a Room object.

classes.name: _BookingCreateScreenState
classes.description: State class managing the form state, date pickers, form validation, booking creation, and navigation.

classes.name: PaymentScreenArgs
classes.description: A data class encapsulating arguments for navigating to the payment screen, including booking ID and amount.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes state, sets room ID if a room is provided.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Disposes resources such as text controllers.

methods.name: _pickDate
methods.description: Displays a date picker dialog for selecting check-in or check-out date.

methods.name: _fmt
methods.description: Formats a DateTime object into 'yyyy-MM-dd' string or returns placeholder text.

methods.name: _submit
methods.description: Handles form submission, creates booking via service, manages errors, and navigates to payment.

methods.name: _onSubmitPressed
methods.description: Validates date inputs and triggers submission.
